001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidTypeFunctionException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAtomicValuedItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
021
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.stream.Stream;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027/**
028 * Implements the XPath 3.1
029 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-data">fn:data</a>
030 * functions.
031 */
032public final class FnData {
033  private static final String NAME = "data";
034  @NonNull
035  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_NO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
036      .name(NAME)
037      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
038      .deterministic()
039      .contextDependent()
040      .focusDependent()
041      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
042      .returnOne()
043      .functionHandler(FnData::executeNoArg)
044      .build();
045
046  @NonNull
047  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
048      .name(NAME)
049      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
050      .deterministic()
051      .contextIndependent()
052      .focusIndependent()
053      .argument(IArgument.builder()
054          .name("arg1")
055          .type(IItem.class)
056          .zeroOrMore()
057          .build())
058      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
059      .returnOne()
060      .functionHandler(FnData::executeOneArg)
061      .build();
062
063  private FnData() {
064    // disable construction
065  }
066
067  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
068  @NonNull
069  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeNoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
070      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
071      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
072      IItem focus) {
073
074    INodeItem item = FunctionUtils.requireTypeOrNull(INodeItem.class, focus);
075
076    ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> retval;
077    if (item == null) {
078      retval = ISequence.empty();
079    } else {
080      IAnyAtomicItem data = fnDataItem(item);
081      retval = ISequence.of(data);
082    }
083    return retval;
084  }
085
086  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
087  @NonNull
088  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeOneArg(
089      @NonNull IFunction function,
090      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
091      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
092      IItem focus) {
093
094    ISequence<?> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
095    return fnData(sequence);
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * An implementation of XPath 3.1
100   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-data">fn:data</a>
101   * supporting <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-atomization">item
102   * atomization</a>.
103   *
104   * @param sequence
105   *          the sequence of items to atomize
106   * @return the atomized result
107   */
108  @SuppressWarnings("null")
109  @NonNull
110  public static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> fnData(@NonNull ISequence<? extends IItem> sequence) {
111    return ISequence.of(sequence.stream()
112        .flatMap(FnData::atomize));
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * An implementation of
117   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-atomization">item
118   * atomization</a>.
119   *
120   * @param item
121   *          the item to atomize
122   * @return the atomized result
123   */
124  @NonNull
125  public static IAnyAtomicItem fnDataItem(@NonNull IItem item) {
126    IAnyAtomicItem retval = null;
127    if (item instanceof IAtomicValuedItem) {
128      retval = ((IAtomicValuedItem) item).toAtomicItem();
129    }
130
131    if (retval != null) {
132      return retval;
133    }
134    throw new InvalidTypeFunctionException(InvalidTypeFunctionException.NODE_HAS_NO_TYPED_VALUE, item);
135  }
136
137  /**
138   * An implementation of
139   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-atomization">item
140   * atomization</a>.
141   *
142   * @param item
143   *          the item to atomize
144   * @return the atomized result
145   */
146  @NonNull
147  public static Stream<IAnyAtomicItem> fnDataItem(@NonNull IArrayItem<?> item) {
148    return ObjectUtils.notNull(item.stream().flatMap(member -> {
149      Stream<IAnyAtomicItem> result;
150      if (member instanceof IItem) {
151        result = atomize((IItem) member);
152      } else if (member instanceof ISequence) {
153        result = ((ISequence<?>) member).stream()
154            .flatMap(FnData::atomize);
155      } else {
156        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("array member not an item or sequence.");
157      }
158      return result;
159    }));
160  }
161
162  /**
163   * An implementation of
164   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-atomization">item
165   * atomization</a>.
166   *
167   * @param item
168   *          the item to atomize
169   * @return the atomized result
170   */
171  @NonNull
172  public static Stream<IAnyAtomicItem> atomize(@NonNull IItem item) {
173    Stream<IAnyAtomicItem> retval;
174    if (item instanceof IAnyAtomicItem) {
175      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.of((IAnyAtomicItem) item));
176    } else if (item instanceof IAtomicValuedItem) {
177      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.of(((IAtomicValuedItem) item).toAtomicItem()));
178    } else if (item instanceof IArrayItem) {
179      retval = fnDataItem((IArrayItem<?>) item);
180    } else {
181      throw new InvalidTypeFunctionException(InvalidTypeFunctionException.NODE_HAS_NO_TYPED_VALUE, item);
182    }
183    return retval;
184  }
185}
